blogPost.excerpt: Stop wasting time to recreate the same things to manage your projects every time. With Notion PM you have everything already done: document binder, contacts, stages, roadmap, tasks, and page templates. One-click. 3 different styles with more than 200 assets.
blogPost.body: Stop wasting time to recreate the same things to manage your projects every time. With Notion PM you have everything already done: document binder, contacts, stages, roadmap, tasks, and page templates. One-click. 3 different styles with more than 200 assets.
blogPost.title: Notion PM - The perfect workspace to manage projects with your clients
blogPost.author: Vincenzo Di Cosmo

localize.description: 不要再浪费时间去重新创建同样的东西来管理你的项目。有了Notion PM，你已经拥有了一切：文件夹、联系人、阶段、路线图、任务和页面模板。一键式。3种不同的风格，200多种资产。
localize.tagline: 与客户一起管理项目的完美工作空间。

localize.description: 不要再浪費時間去重新創建同樣的東西來管理你的項目。有了Notion PM，你已經擁有了一切：文件夾、聯繫人、階段、路線圖、任務和頁面模板。一鍵式。3種不同的風格，200多種資產。
localize.tagline: 與客戶一起管理項目的完美工作空間。

previous.excerpt: Mibo is videochat made for informal meetings, remote drinks, social mixers, networking events, or just hanging out with your team. In Mibo, you decide what conversations to join and where to hang out. Mibo feels like being together. Just like real life.
previous.title: Mibo - Videoconferencing that feels like real life

localize.description: Mibo是为非正式会议、远程酒会、社交聚会、网络活动或只是与你的团队一起闲逛而设计的视频聊天软件。在Mibo中，您可以决定加入什么对话和在哪里闲逛。Mibo感觉就像在一起。就像现实生活一样。
localize.tagline: 宛如真实生活的视频会议

localize.description: Mibo是爲非正式會議、遠程酒會、社交聚會、網絡活動或只是與你的團隊一起閒逛而設計的視頻聊天軟件。在Mibo中，您可以決定加入什麼對話和在哪裏閒逛。Mibo感覺就像在一起。就像現實生活一樣。
localize.tagline: 宛如真實生活的視頻會議

next.excerpt: There's an abundance of sources available for hearing the trending, breaking news updates. We keep you informed on the stories that don't make it to the front page, for free.
next.title: Below the Fold - News you aren’t hearing anywhere else

localize.description: 有丰富的消息来源，可以听到最新的趋势，突发新闻。我们让你了解那些没有上头版的故事，免费的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方听不到的新闻

localize.description: 有豐富的消息來源，可以聽到最新的趨勢，突發新聞。我們讓你瞭解那些沒有上頭版的故事，免費的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方聽不到的新聞
